definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Shanghai is one of the main centers where Chinese arts and crafts are made.
sentences.chinese: 上海是中國工藝美術品製造的主要中心之一。

sentences.english: Have you arranged any space for the arts and crafts?
sentences.chinese: 你爲這些工藝美術品安排好房間了嗎？

sentences.english: An important requirement of artwork change management is support for dynamic reviews.
sentences.chinese: 美術品更改管理的一個重要要求就是支持動態審查。

sentences.english: The production of a work of art throws a light upon the mystery of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 美術品的創造爲人類的傳奇揭開一線曙光。

sentences.english: To art as a basis, undertake scientific restoration productions.
sentences.chinese: 以美術品原作爲依據，進行科學的復原製作。

sentences.english: Traditional exports like art products should be increased by every means.
sentences.chinese: 工藝美術品等傳統出口產品，要千方百計地增加出口。

definition: the war of 1904-1905 between Russia and Japan
the Mukden or Manchurian Railway Incident of 18th September 1931 used by the Japanese as a pretext to annex Manchuria/also known as Liutiaogou incident 柳條溝事變|柳条沟事变
Japanese Kwantung army (or Kantō army), notorious for numerous atrocities in China during WWII
